mapper.sql: id, name, password, sex, age, phone, email, head_portrait, living, working_years, creation_time, modify_time, state
mapper.select:
select
from user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
name,
password,
sex,
age,
phone,
email,
head_portrait,
living,
working_years,
creation_time,
modify_time,
state,

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
living = #{living,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
working_years = #{workingYears,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, living = #{living,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, working_years = #{workingYears,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
